## Ignore Visual Studio temporary files, build results, and
## files generated by popular Visual Studio add-ons.

# User-specific files
*.rsuser
*.suo
*.user
*.userosscache
*.sln.docstates

# Build results
bin/
obj/
out/
Debug/
Release/
*.dll
*.exe
*.pdb
*.cache
*.log

# Visual Studio files
.vscode/
.vs/
Generated_Code/

# NuGet
*.nupkg
*.snupkg
.nuget/

# Rider
.idea/

# OS generated files
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db

# Others
*.dbmdl
*.bak
*.backup
*.old
*.orig
*.tmp

# Entity Framework Migrations Snapshots
Migrations/*.Designer.cs
Migrations/*ModelSnapshot.cs
